glossary: to establish (an organization, a facility, a position, etc.)
to appoint (someone to a certain position)
to place (one's trust, one's faith, etc.)
to put down a tool (e.g. a pen) hence stopping what one is doing with that tool
to provide lodging in one's house

meanings.info: after the -te form of a verb
after the -te form of a verb
glossary: to keep something in a certain state
to leave something in a certain state
